Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Foxhound
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
In the past, the Foxhound was designed and built as a 4Ã—4 armored response and rescue vehicle for military and police services, and was widely used in riot-suppression, raids, and sting operations. With law and order long since forgotten on most of the RimWorlds, the Foxhound is also commonly employed by the less-than-savory with illicit cargo to move. Still a common sight both on and off the battlefield, it features 70mm thick steel bumpers and solid armor, and maintains a decent top speed despite the added weight. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x6
<color=#bb8f04>Power:</color> Chemfuel
